While the last steps are proving to be the toughest I am optimistic we will eradicate polio. I recently visited Leuven Rega Institute where they are testing preventative medicine an important step toward a polio-free world.

The climate crisis is already devastating communities. More funding is necessary to ensure agricultural and technological innovations are widely available to the most vulnerable, helping them adapt to climate change, save lives, and increase economic opportunity.
We leave Australian shores short of achieving our dream and with disappointment in our hearts but we can take back a lot of memorable moments as a group and aim to get better from here on.
